channel.title: Runecrafting altars
channel.description:
Hey, I've been trying to re-work the runecrafting on my friends server, but I don't know how to get each altar to give a certain amount of exp, amount of runes your get back from each one, but basically I just need to figure out how to get my altar working fully. Can anyone help me?
It is a Project Insanity Base.

item.title: Runecrafting altars
item.dc:creator: @shadytheone shadytheone
item.description:
@shadytheone wrote:

find the case of your altar
& look for addSkillXP
& the addItem command.

change it…
